content: bobble hat pattern by @abscrochets about this pattern it s made from the bottom up and is made to measure all stitch counts are based on my measurements and are there as a guide if you make a different size your stitch counts will differ the pattern is written to have a folded brim but can be made unfolded by repeating bobbles 2 times instead of 3 i loved making these hats and i hope you do too happy crocheting stitches used us crochet terms single_crochet single_crochet slipstitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain chain single_crochet back loop only scblo decrease decrease half_double_crochet in third loop tutorial link below bobble stitch puff worked around the post of double_crochet tutorial link below https //www youtube com/watch v=9dhzmz03mqa -scblo tutorial by @hearthookhome on instagram https //www youtube com/watch v=n83f0oplzfq - puff tutorial by @richtexturescrochet on instagram materials used ● weight 4 yarn i used 250 yds of red heart super saver ● 4 5 mm crochet hook ● scissors ● yarn needle ● optional faux fur pompom pattern begins here note your starting number of chains will be the height of the ribbing at the beginning of the hat i chained 10 row 1 chain starting number of chains height of ribbing row 2 to create ribbing- *scblo into each st along starting chains chain 1 at the end of each row before turning repeat from * until your ribbing is long enough to fit comfortably around your head slip_stitch along the ribbing to join i had 77 row of ribbing = 19 in note if you make a folded brim you ll want more space between the ribbing and your head to allow for the fabric to be folded over the bobbles completed ribbing row 3 chain 2 double_crochet in the top of each row of ribbing slip_stitch to first double_crochet to join 77 double_crochet row 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet 3rd loop in each st slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet to join 77 half_double_crochet row 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet 3rd loop in each st slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet to join 77 half_double_crochet row 6 chain 1 single_crochet 3rd loop in each st slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join 77 single_crochet row 7 chain 2 create bobbles around see tutorial above *double_crochet in first st puff st with 3 yarnovers skip next st repeat from * to end slip_stitch to first double_crochet 38 bobbles row 8 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each st join with slip_stitch 77 half_double_crochet this is what it should look like after one row of bobbles row 9-13 repeat row 4-8 once you ll end with row 13 77 half_double_crochet row 14-17 repeat 4-7 once you ll end with row 17 77 half_double_crochet * note if you are making the hat without a folded brim skip this step after completing row 13 move onto row 18 after all of the bobble stitches are completed we will begin to decrease row 18 chain 2 half_double_crochet decrease in first 2 st half_double_crochet
